article:
The '[[Occupy Wall Street]]' protests have inspired a wide international
response. There have been hundreds of Occupy movement protests worldwide over
time, some turning violent. This is a 'list of some of their locations'. Months
before the Occupy movement began, the '[[2011 Spanish protests|Movimiento 15-
M]]' planned to hold events in many nations on October 15, 2011. The Occupy movement joined
in and also held many events in many nations on that day. A list of proposed events for the 15 October 2011 global
protests listed events in 951 cities in 82 countries.

On the one-year anniversary of the Occupy Movement (September 17, 2012), the
Guardian published the "Occupy Directory"'s map as a "The map of the Occupy
world."
